Articles.Content:
Hey, I'm the latest new one!

Being with ksp since 0.22 ( so still new, shiny and clean ) and I was lurking the forums ever since because its such a huge knowledge base and source of inspiration that provided hours and hours of fun to me. Thanks for that, its an awesome community. But now i wanna have a voice here, theres so much fun going on where i would like to finally participate.

I'm 28 and from Kermany, if that matters ( seen the term "Kermany" here in some users' info and instantly fell in love with it because it fits so well )
Welcome to the forums and enjoy your stay. May your voice be heard!
Welcome!! I hear Kermany is nice this time of year.

Hello and welcome to the forums.

Hope you'll enjoy your stay!
